episodes.title: Shunning & Re-Kindling Acquaintances after leaving Jehovahs Witnesses
episodes.description: The Watchtower Organization instructs Jehovahs Winesses to shun those who leave or are "spiritually weak", to keep acquaintances at arms length and only make friends amongst other witnesses. Joy discusses how shunning affects you and how JWs view you as scum if you leave the religion. How the Jehovahs Witness religion keeps you so busy that you do not have time to associate with normal non JW people and make friends outside the religion. This intentional isolation is designed to prevent you from leaving, as you will lose your entire support network. Joy encourages getting out and re-kindling friendships outside.

episodes.title: Joy on Living Forever & the JW Anointed Numbers
episodes.description: Joy goes solo in discussing aspects of Watchtower teachings that personally affected her. Living Forever, The date for Armageddon and the anointed dying off (or not).

episodes.title: More reasons why we woke up from the Jehovahs Witness religion.
episodes.description:
More on what woke us up from the Watchtower induced sleep.
Crazy teachings like the overlapping generations, 607 etc
Quickbuilds, KingDumb Hall sales, Donations and more...

There is great support for those wanting to leave the JW religion - check out www.jwfacts.com and www.reddit.com/r/exjw
